title.narrative: PROGRAMME PLANNING AND MONITORING

description.narrative: Office-wide planning, performance monitoring, evaluation and assurance activities., which contributes to Cross-Sectoral - Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral - Planning And Programme Reviews, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Country programmes are eficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards in achieving results for children

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Office-wide planning, performance monitoring, evaluation and assurance activities.

description.narrative: The operation for 2021;was planned and resources allocated in a timely manner. HACT quality assurance activities in 2021;were reviewed monthly in;RTP,;CMT, head of sectors;with a good results and;advances;in the completion of the;assurance activities (programmatic visits).;All grants were properly managed, and reports were sent on time.;Programme budget utilization reached;100 per cent;as of 31 December 2021.; | Status:Met | As-of Date:27/12/2021
